tasks.title: Initialize package structure and pyproject.toml
tasks.description: Create the mamba-mcp-server-gitlab package directory structure under packages/ with pyproject.toml, README.md placeholder, and src/mamba_mcp_server_gitlab/ directory with __init__.py
acceptance_criteria: pyproject.toml configured with correct dependencies (python-gitlab>=4.0.0, mcp>=1.0.0, mamba-mcp-core workspace, pydantic>=2.0.0, pydantic-settings>=2.0.0)
Package can be installed with uv sync
tasks.notes: Follow existing mamba-mcp-client package structure as reference

tasks.title: Implement configuration system with Pydantic
tasks.description: Create config.py with Pydantic settings for GitLab URL, token, token type, SSL verification, timeout, and default project. Support environment variables with GITLAB_ prefix and optional config file loading.
acceptance_criteria: GitLabConfig class with all required fields (url, token, token_type, ssl_verify, timeout, default_project)
Environment variable support with GITLAB_ prefix
Configuration priority: CLI args > env vars > config file > defaults
tasks.notes: Use pydantic-settings for environment variable binding

tasks.title: Create GitLab client wrapper
tasks.description: Create gitlab_client.py wrapping python-gitlab library. Handle authentication with PAT, project tokens, and group tokens. Implement connection testing and graceful error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Support for PAT, project token, and group token authentication
tasks.notes: Consider lazy initialization of the gitlab client

tasks.title: Implement structured error handling
tasks.description: Create errors.py with custom exception classes and error codes. Map GitLab API errors to structured error responses with actionable messages.
acceptance_criteria: Error codes defined: GITLAB_UNAUTHORIZED, GITLAB_FORBIDDEN, GITLAB_NOT_FOUND, GITLAB_CONFLICT, GITLAB_RATE_LIMITED, GITLAB_SERVER_ERROR, CONFIG_INVALID, VALIDATION_ERROR
ErrorDetail model with code, message, details fields
ToolResponse model with success, data, error fields
Helper function to convert python-gitlab exceptions to structured errors

tasks.title: Set up MCP server entry point with transport support
tasks.description: Create server.py with MCP server initialization. Support STDIO and Streamable HTTP transports. Wire up configuration loading and tool registration.
acceptance_criteria: Streamable HTTP transport working with configurable host/port
Transport selection via config or CLI argument

tasks.title: Wire up tool registration system
tasks.description: Create tools/__init__.py with tool registration mechanism. Connect server.py to load and register all tools from the tools/ directory.
acceptance_criteria: All tools from submodules auto-registered with server
Server lists all registered tools correctly

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_list tool
tasks.description: Create merge request list tool with filtering by state (opened, closed, merged, all), author, assignee, labels. Support pagination.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id (required), state (optional), author (optional), assignee (optional), labels (optional), page (optional), per_page (optional)
Returns list of MRs with iid, title, description, source_branch, target_branch, state, author

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_get tool
tasks.description: Create tool to get full merge request details including commit list, approval status, and pipeline status.
acceptance_criteria: Returns full MR metadata including title, description, source/target branches

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_diff tool
tasks.description: Create tool to get merge request diff with file changes in unified format. Handle binary files gracefully.
acceptance_criteria: Returns file changes with context lines
Includes old_path and new_path for renames
Binary files marked appropriately without content
tasks.notes: Consider truncation strategy for very large diffs

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_comment tool (general)
tasks.description: Create tool to post general discussion comments on a merge request with markdown support.

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_comment_line tool
tasks.description: Create tool to post line-specific comments on merge request diffs. Support old/new line positions and commit association.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, mr_iid, body, path (file path), line (line number), line_type (old/new), commit_sha (optional)
Comment appears on correct line in diff view
Supports specifying old vs new side of diff
tasks.notes: GitLab API uses position object for diff comments - requires careful construction

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_approve tool
tasks.description: Create tool to approve a merge request. Handle already-approved case gracefully.
acceptance_criteria: Returns updated approval status (total approvals, approved_by list)
Handles already-approved case (idempotent or informative message)
Returns GITLAB_FORBIDDEN if user lacks approval permission

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_unapprove tool
tasks.description: Create tool to remove current user's approval from a merge request.

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_merge tool
tasks.description: Create tool to merge a merge request with squash and delete source branch options. Handle merge conflicts gracefully.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, mr_iid, squash (optional bool), delete_source_branch (optional bool), merge_commit_message (optional)
Returns merge result with merged commit SHA
Returns GITLAB_CONFLICT if merge conflicts exist
Returns appropriate error if MR not in mergeable state

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_mr_discussions tool
tasks.description: Create tool to list all discussion threads on a merge request including resolved status and replies.
acceptance_criteria: Includes all notes/replies within each thread
Includes author and timestamp for each note

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_list tool
tasks.description: Create tool to list pipelines for a project with filtering by ref, status, and source. Support pagination.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, ref (optional), status (optional), source (optional), page (optional), per_page (optional)
Returns list of pipelines with id, status, ref, sha, created_at
Status filter values: running, pending, success, failed, canceled, skipped

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_get tool
tasks.description: Create tool to get detailed pipeline status including job breakdown, duration, and timestamps.
acceptance_criteria: Returns full pipeline details: id, status, ref, sha, before_sha, tag, user, created_at, started_at, finished_at, duration

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_job_logs tool
tasks.description: Create tool to get job log output. Handle large logs with truncation and indicator.
acceptance_criteria: Returns full job log output as text
Large logs truncated with clear indicator (e.g., '[truncated - showing last N lines]')
Handles jobs with no logs yet

tasks.title: Write unit tests for MR tools
tasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all merge request tools using mocked GitLab API responses.
acceptance_criteria: Success path tests for each MR tool
Error scenario tests (not found, forbidden, conflict)

tasks.title: Write unit tests for pipeline tools
tasks.description: Create unit tests for pipeline and job tools using mocked GitLab API responses.
acceptance_criteria: Success path tests for pipeline_list, pipeline_get, job_logs

tasks.title: Write README documentation for MVP
tasks.description: Create comprehensive README with installation, configuration, quick start, and tool reference for all MVP tools.
acceptance_criteria: Configuration guide for env vars and config file
Quick start examples for common workflows
Tool reference with parameters and examples for all MR tools

tasks.title: Write unit tests for configuration
tasks.description: Create tests for config.py covering environment variables, config file loading, and validation.

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_trigger tool
tasks.description: Create tool to trigger a new pipeline on a ref with optional variables.
acceptance_criteria: Triggers new pipeline on specified ref
Returns new pipeline ID and status

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_retry tool
tasks.description: Create tool to retry a failed pipeline.

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_cancel tool
tasks.description: Create tool to cancel a running pipeline.

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_pipeline_jobs tool
tasks.description: Create tool to list jobs for a specific pipeline with status, duration, and stage info.
acceptance_criteria: Returns list of jobs with id, name, status, stage, duration, started_at, finished_at
Jobs ordered by stage execution order
Includes failure reason for failed jobs

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_issue_list tool
tasks.description: Create tool to list issues with filtering by state, labels, assignee, milestone. Support search and pagination.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, state (optional), labels (optional), assignee (optional), milestone (optional), search (optional), page (optional), per_page (optional)
Returns list of issues with iid, title, state, labels, assignees, milestone
Search works against title and description

tasks.title: Write unit tests for remaining pipeline tools
tasks.description: Create unit tests for pipeline trigger, retry, cancel, and jobs tools.
acceptance_criteria: Success path tests for trigger, retry, cancel, jobs

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_issue_get tool
tasks.description: Create tool to get full issue details including labels, assignees, milestone, and related MRs.
acceptance_criteria: Returns full issue data including all labels, assignees, milestone
Includes list of related merge requests

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_issue_create tool
tasks.description: Create tool to create a new issue with title, description, labels, assignee, and milestone.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, title (required), description (optional), labels (optional list), assignee_ids (optional list), milestone_id (optional)
Creates issue with all specified fields

tasks.title: Implement gitlab_issue_update tool
tasks.description: Create tool to update issue fields supporting partial updates.
acceptance_criteria: Parameters: project_id, issue_iid, title (optional), description (optional), labels (optional), assignee_ids (optional), milestone_id (optional), state_event (optional: close/reopen)
tasks.notes: Combines update, close, and reopen functionality via state_event

tasks.title: Write unit tests for issue tools
tasks.description: Create unit tests for all issue management tools.
acceptance_criteria: Success path tests for list, get, create, update

execution_phases.name: MVP Pipeline Tools & Remaining MR Tools
